alert.note: Alert for Champaign; Christian; Douglas; Macon; Moultrie; Piatt (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 03 at 3:53PM CDT until August 03 at 4:30PM CDT by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 430 PM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN CHRISTIAN...NORTHERN MOULTRIE...PIATT...SOUTHWESTERN CHAMPAIGN...NORTHWESTERN DOUGLAS AND SOUTHERN MACON COUNTIES... At 353 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Monticello to near Mount Zion, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Tolono, Pesotum, Savoy, Lovington, Hammond, Arthur, Philo and Atwood. This includes the following highways... Interstate 57 between mile markers 220 and 232. Interstate 72 between mile markers 144 and 153, and between mile markers 156 and 168. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Champaign; Christian; Douglas; Macon; Moultrie; Piatt
